item.title: About
item.description: Work and education I graduated from Moscow Institute of Physics and Technology with a Bachelorâ€™s degree in applied mathematics and physics. During my first year, I discovered my interest in computer science and started competing in programming challenges. Later, I got the chance to participate in Google Summer of Code, where I built a tool using Clang to find copy-pasted code in open-source projects (see poster with results). This led to an internship offer at Google.

item.title: Contact
item.description: If you want to reach out, here are few options: Telegram kbobyrev.opensource@gmail.com Socials And here are my accounts on other platforms: LinkedIn GitHub Mastodon Instagram Twitter Lichess Chess.com Codeforces
